s3tables:kmskeyarn.description: Filters access by the AWS KMS key ARN for the key used to encrypt a table

s3tables:ssealgorithm.description: Filters access by the server-side encryption algorithm used to encrypt a table

s3tables:namespace.description: Filters access by the namespaces created in the table bucket

s3tables:tablename.description: Filters access by the name of the tables in the table bucket
